entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is very important to us. Please hold while we connect you with the next available agent.
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit! My name is Sarah. How can I help you today?
I want to return a VeloBand Pulse. It's completely useless.
Okay, I can help with that. Can you provide me with your order number, please?
It's 789456123. I bought the VeloBand Pulse like, two weeks ago. This is ridiculous.

Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see it here. You purchased the VeloBand Pulse 15 days ago. No problem at all. Our return policy is 90 days for most items, so you're well within that window.

90 days? Good, because I was about to lose it. This thing is junk. The heart rate monitor is completely off, it doesn't track my sleep properly, and honestly, it's just a cheap smart watch pretending to be something it's not. Can I just get the return label sent to my email, please?

Absolutely! I can send you a prepaid return label to the email address associated with your account. It should arrive within the next few minutes. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse securely and drop it off at any authorized carrier location.
Fine. Just send the label. What about my refund? How long will that take?

Once we receive the returned item, it usually takes 7-10 business days for the refund to be processed back to your original form of payment. You'll receive an email notification once the refund has been issued.
7 to 10 days? Seriously? I need that money back sooner. This whole experience has been a nightmare.
I understand your frustration, I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, that is our standard processing time for returns. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

Yes, there is. Can I speak to a manager? Because this is unacceptable. 7 to 10 days is way too long to wait for a refund for a defective product, especially considering I’m still within the… what was it? …90 days return policy, right? This VeloBand Pulse experience is a joke.
I understand you'd like to speak to a manager. Let me see if one is available. Please hold for a moment.
(pause) I'm very sorry, all of our managers are currently assisting other customers. Would you like me to take a message and have one call you back within 24-48 hours?
Unbelievable. 24 to 48 hours? You know what? Forget it. This is a waste of my time.
